definition.name: Demo for pEPR - Extended Producer Responsibilities: provide your organisation details (EA)

pages.title: Form guidance

components.content:
Use this form to submit your organisation details, which will allow you to register with the Environment Agency (EA) as a reprocessor or exporter of packaging waste.

It may take around 15 minutes to complete the form. [Read what information you should have ready before you start.](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/packaging-waste-2026-registration-and-accreditation-process-for-reprocessors-and-exporters#submit-your-organisation-details)

For information on how Defra and the environmental regulators (EA, NRW, DAERA, SEPA) process your personal data, please visit the [privacy notice on GOV.UK](https://www.gov.uk/guidance/extended-producer-responsibility-for-packaging-privacy-policy).

pages.title: Is your organisation a registered charity?

components.title: Is your organisation a registered charity?
components.name: FAxvwq

pages.title: Charities do not need to register

components.content: Registered charities are exempt and do not need to register as a reprocessor or exporter of packaging waste under the Producer Responsibility Obligations (Packaging and Packaging Waste) Regulations 2024.

pages.title: Are you currently reprocessing or exporting packaging waste to be recycled?

components.title: Are you currently reprocessing or exporting packaging waste to be recycled?
components.name: WVADkQ

pages.title: You do not need to register

components.content:
Registration is only mandatory if you are a reprocessor or exporter of packaging waste.

If you are a reprocessor or exporter of packaging waste, you must apply for registration by 1 October 2025. This is so you can meet the new mandatory requirement to be registered for the year starting 1 January 2026, subject to approval.

pages.title: Names of partners in your partnership

components.content:
This means any company entity partners and corporate partners, which are listed as partners within your partnership, that is not registered on Companies House. 

If you have more than one partner in your partnership, enter the details of one of them on this page. You will be able to add another on the next page.

pages.title: Summary

components.content:

**By submitting this application you confirm the information you provided is accurate.**
